name: The Murder Express (SuitsnNukes) (SuitsnNukes)
description:
"The Murder Express" is a "who-dunnit?" clue style game that takes place on a train. The game generates a random crime each time so each replay  is unique. Mr. Duvall has been murdered and it's up to the inspector to crack the case without getting killed in the process!Can you survive a ride on the murder express?

- a randomly generated murder scenario with different motives and clues to determine the killer's identity


- 11 fully voice acted suspects


- Featuring actual killers such as Ted Bundy, John Wayne Gacy, Edmund Kemper and more!


- High tension throughout as you sleuth through the shadows and try to avoid being MURDERED BY THE KILLER!
